sentence.text: It has been reported that N-myc downstream regulated gene 1 (NDRG1) is related to the prognosis of non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC), and associated with negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II degradation in NSCLC cell lines.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: However, the relationship of DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator to prognosis or negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression in lung adenocarcinoma has not been well clarified.

entity.text: DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The present study was designed to investigate the prognostic significance of DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator and/or negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression in lung adenocarcinoma using immunohistochemistry with a tissue microarray.

entity.text: DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: We examined 184 lung adenocarcinomas and observed low expression of DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator in adenocarcinoma in situ (oxidation-reduction process) and minimally invasive adenocarcinoma (MIA), whereas high expression of NDRG1 was seen in invasive adenocarcinoma.

entity.text: DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator
